explanation:
Answer

3/8
F ∩ W = {HHH, HHT, HTH}. p(F ∩ W) = |F ∩ W|/8 = 3/8.
instructions:
A fair coin is flipped 3 times. Define the following events:

  • F: the first flip comes up heads.
  • E: the number of heads is even. (Zero is an even number.)
  • W: at least two of the three flips come up heads.
question: What is the probability that the first flip is heads and there are at least two flips that are heads?
section: 5.9.2: Determining whether two events are independent - three coin flips.
